snippet: Lawmakers are promised anonymity in exchange for honest input on tax reform.
abstract: Editorial expresses mild skepticism concerning Senate Finance Committee's effort to reform tax code by allowing lawmakers to anonymously nominate tax credits and deductions for chopping block; notes that 1,000 pages of suggestions have already been put forth under intense computer and physical security.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers are promised anonymity in exchange for honest input on tax reform.

headline.main: Shh! Senate at Work on a National Secret.
headline.print_headline: Shh! Senate at Work on a National Secret.
